text: The 1954 World Table Tennis Championships – Women's Singles was the 21st edition of the women's singles championship. Angelica Rozeanu defeated Yoshiko Tanaka in the final by three sets to one, to win a fifth consecutive title. ==Results== ==See also== List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== \- Category:1954 in women's table tennis
title: 1954 World Table Tennis Championships – Women's Singles
